item.title: Stellar Transformations
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
A child was naturally born unable to practice asceticism/ inner strength. To get his fathers attention, he chose to practice outer strength the painful way. Spring passed Autumn came, time flew, this child grew as the year passed… He became a teenager, the thing that changed his fate is a spear that’s is made from...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: A child was naturally born unable to practice asceticism/ inner strength. To get his fathers attention, he chose to practice outer strength the painful way. Spring passed Autumn came, time flew, this child grew as the year passed… He became a teenager, the thing that changed his fate is a spear that’s is made from a shooting star/ shooting star that became a spear…

item.title: Miracle App Store
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?
item.content:encoded: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?

item.title: Martial God’s Space
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: He’s been transported to another world. And the adopted son of a powerful family. But the heavens are unjust he has bad cultivation. But heaven pitying him has given a magical space. Follow his journey in this new world…
item.content:encoded: He’s been transported to another world. And the adopted son of a powerful family. But the heavens are unjust he has bad cultivation. But heaven pitying him has given a magical space. Follow his journey in this new world…

item.title: Duo Xuan Shi
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: After the gold medalist agent was betrayed and killed, the mysterious beauty possessed the system and reincarnated him. Xiu Xuan’s world is dominated by hegemony, and Warlords. This world has set a small goal for Chu-Yue – becoming the strongest
item.content:encoded: After the gold medalist agent was betrayed and killed, the mysterious beauty possessed the system and reincarnated him. Xiu Xuan’s world is dominated by hegemony, and Warlords. This world has set a small goal for Chu-Yue – becoming the strongest

item.title: Panfia
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: Its been 15 years after the last Great War. While the scars of wars appear to have vanished on the outside.In truth, the world has become a much harsher place.Follow the journey of Felix and Bay on their quest to find someone from their past.
item.content:encoded: Its been 15 years after the last Great War. While the scars of wars appear to have vanished on the outside.In truth, the world has become a much harsher place.Follow the journey of Felix and Bay on their quest to find someone from their past.

item.title: Sword Legend
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
The death criminals whom lived in the jail country, Palom are entering the “MAD GAME” in the progress. This is a battle for your freedom. What is the meaning of freedom ? Those that spill scum blood like a butcher massacring people, is there the flavor of freedom ? I swore before , I will...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: The death criminals whom lived in the jail country, Palom are entering the “MAD GAME” in the progress. This is a battle for your freedom. What is the meaning of freedom ? Those that spill scum blood like a butcher massacring people, is there the flavor of freedom ? I swore before , I will use the legend sword in hand, breaking apart the shackles of this world !!
